title: The Ohio State University employee asked for sympathy for the campus attacker.
subtitle: A staff member of the Operations Support Unit was accused of encouraging sympathy on the Facebook site, which has since been cancelled regarding the suspected stabbing of Abdelrazaq Ali Artan on campus.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: A staff member at Ohio State University entered Facebook to encourage him to sympathize with a student believed to have been shocked and stabbed many people on campus.
